TEXT.English: Increases production and commerce in your capital city
Workers build improvements faster; extra production from pastures; extra commerce from farms
Increases great general emergence; can draft two units per turn; extra happiness from barracks'

TEXT.French: La forme la plus primitive de doctrine légale.
TEXT.Italian: La forma di Sistema legale più primitiva
TEXT.Spanish: El principio legal más primitivo.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut créer des missionnaires sans [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_Building[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No se pueden construir misioneros sin [NUM1:un:una:unos:unas] [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]%s1_Building[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappOrUnhapp : [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s3_Building[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HappOrUnhapp por [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT][LINK=literal]%s3_Building[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Increases production and commerce in your capital city
TEXT.French: Augmente la production et le commerce dans votre capitale.
TEXT.German: Steigert die Produktion und stärkt die Wirtschaft in Ihrer Hauptstadt.
TEXT.Italian: Aumenta la produzione e il commercio della capitale
TEXT.Spanish: Aumentan la producción y el comercio en la capital.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Income from [ICON_TRADE] going through your Capital
Increased commerce in all cities; extra commerce from towns; can spend gold to finish production of buildings
You may assign unlimited artist, scientist, and merchant specialists in your cities.
TEXT.French: Vous pouvez assigner un nombre illimité d'artistes, de savants et de marchands à vos villes.
TEXT.German: Sie können in Ihren Städten beliebig viele Künstler-, Wissenschaftler- und Händler-Spezialisten zuweisen.
TEXT.Italian: Possibilità di assegnare artisti, scienziati e mercanti specialisti illimitati alle città
TEXT.Spanish: Se pueden asignar sin límite artistas, científicos y mercaderes especialistas a las ciudades.

TEXT.English: Extra production from specialists; extra food from workshops and watermills; less commerce from windmills, watermills and towns; double production speed for factories and coal plants
Increased maintenance from number of cities; specialists produce food if city works less than seven tiles
[ICON_BULLET]No negative Stability Points for low amount of traded resources
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour un faible niveau de ressources échangées
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Keine Stabilitätspunktabzüge durch eine geringe Anzahl gehandelter Ressourcen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di scarso commercio di risorse.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por baja cantidad de recursos intercambiados

TEXT.English: No negative Stability Points for low amount of traded resources; no negative Stability Points for poor economy
TEXT.French: Pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour un faible niveau de ressources échangées ; pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour une économie pauvre
TEXT.German: Keine Stabilitätspunktabzüge durch geringfügig gehandelte Ressourcen; keine Stabilitätspunktabzüge durch schlechte Wirtschaftslage
TEXT.Italian: Nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di scarso commercio di risorse; nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di scarsa economia.
TEXT.Spanish: No hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por baja cantidad de recursos intercambiados; no hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por economía débil

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points on city conquest
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2 points de stabilité à la conquête d'une ville
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]+2 punti stabilità addizionali conquistando una città.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]+2 puntos de estabilidad adicionales por conquista de ciudad

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Peut [LINK=CONCEPT_DRAFT]enrôler[\LINK] %d1_Num [NUM1:Unité:Unités] par tour
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Puede [LINK=CONCEPT_DRAFT]reclutar[\LINK] %d1_Num [NUM1:unidad:unidades] por turno

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change free specialist for all cities within the third ring of your capital

TEXT.French: La forme la plus primitive de doctrine économique.
TEXT.Italian: La forma di economia più primitiva
TEXT.Spanish: El principio económico más primitivo.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Income from [ICON_TRADE] with Defensive Pact partners
[ICON_BULLET]Temporary instability caused by transition to Democracy
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Instabilité temporaire causée par la transition vers la Démocratie
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Instabilità temporanea causata dal passaggio alla democrazia.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Inestabilidad temporal causada por la transición a la democracia

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Risque de Grande Dépression
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Riesgo de Gran Depresión

TEXT.French: La forme la plus primitive de doctrine politique.
TEXT.Italian: La forma di Governo più primitiva
TEXT.Spanish: El principio de gobierno más primitivo.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No Maintenance Costs from Distance to Palace
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Aucun coût d'entretien dû à l'éloignement du palais
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessun costo di mantenimento per la distanza dal palazzo
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Sin costes de mantenimiento por lejanía con palacio

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Maintenance Costs from Distance to Palace
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Coût d'entretien %D1_Mod%% dû à l'éloignement du palais
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% costi di mantenimento per la distanza dal palazzo
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a los costes de mantenimiento por lejanía con palacio

TEXT.English: Military units in cities increase happiness to a maximum of +6
[ICON_BULLET]No negative Stability Points for poor economy
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour une économie pauvre
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di scarsa economia.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por economía débil

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Unable to Use Slaves[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][ICON_UNHAPPY] Penalty for Slaves in Civs without [LINK=literal]Egalitarianism[\LINK]
May hire double the amount of artists, scientists and merchants; unhappiness penalty for all civilizations without egalitarianism
Causes unhappiness in civilizations without emancipation; cottages develop faster
TEXT.French: Provoque le mécontentement des civilisations ne connaissant pas l'émancipation. Les cottages se développent plus vite.
TEXT.German: Führt in Zivilisationen ohne Emanzipation zu Unzufriedenheit. Hütten werden schneller fertig.
TEXT.Italian: Causa infelicità nelle civiltà senza emancipazione; le villette si sviluppano più velocemente
TEXT.Spanish: Provoca infelicidad en las ciudades sin emancipación. Las villas se desarrollan más rápido.

TEXT.English: Reduced unhealthiness in all cities; extra commerce from windmills, watermills and forest preserves; extra happiness from public transportation; double production speed for recycling centers and hydro plants; no stability penalty from economic stagnation
[ICON_BULLET]%D1%% Experience gained from Combat within own Borders
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Expérience obtenue suite au combat dans vos frontières : %D1%%
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% Erfahrungszuwachs durch Kämpfe innerhalb der eigenen Grenzen
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% di esperienza per i combattimenti sul proprio territorio
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1%% de experiencia obtenida por combatir dentro de las fronteras propias.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HealthOrUn dans toutes les villes
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HealthOrUn en todas las ciudades

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_WarWearMod%% [ICON_UNHAPPY] dû à la guerre
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_WarWearMod%% al [ICON_UNHAPPY] bélico

TEXT.English: Extra unhappiness from non-state religions; cities with state religion train units faster; no spread of non-state religions

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappOrUnhapp[SPACE]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HappOrUnhapp por[SPACE]

TEXT.English: Extra commerce from plantations and slave plantations, can sacrifice city population to finish production
[ICON_BULLET]+2 additional Stability Points for each city founded at least 15 tiles from the capital
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+2 points de stabilité par ville fondée à 15 cases ou plus de la capitale
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]+2 zusätzliche Stabilitätspunkte für jede Stadt, die mindestens 15 Geländefelder von der Hauptstadt entfernt gegründet wurde
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]+2 punti stabilità addizionali per ogni città fondata ad almeno 15 caselle dalla capitale.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]+2 puntos de estabilidad adicionales por cada ciudad fundada al menos a 15 casillas de la capital

TEXT.English: Extra trade route in all cities; increased corporation commerce

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Num unités militaires gratuites
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Num unidades militares gratis

TEXT.English: No state religion. Happiness from all religions in each city; increased scientific research
TEXT.French: Aucune religion d'état. Toutes les religions augmentent le bonheur dans chaque ville. Accélère la recherche scientifique.
TEXT.German: Keine Staatsreligion. Zufriedenheit aller Religionen in allen Städten. Verstärkte Forschung.
TEXT.Italian: Nessuna religione di stato. Sviluppa felicità da tutte le religioni nelle città; aumenta la ricerca scientifica
TEXT.Spanish: No hay religión oficial. En las ciudades hay felicidad por todas las religiones. Aumenta la investigación científica.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change spécialistes gratuits par ville
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change especialistas gratis por ciudad

TEXT.English: Extra commerce from towns; increases cultural output of all cities
TEXT.French: Augmente le commerce des petites villes et améliore la culture générée par toutes les villes.
TEXT.German: Höhere Wirtschaftserträge in Gemeinden. Steigerung der Kulturproduktion aller Städte.
TEXT.Italian: Commercio extra dai paesi; aumenta la cultura in tutte le città
TEXT.Spanish: Comercio adicional en los pueblos, aumenta la producción cultural en todas las ciudades.

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Num unités gratuites
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Num unidades gratis

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les nouvelles unités reçoivent %D1_Change XP
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las nuevas unidades reciben %D1_Change puntos de experiencia

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET][ICON_UNHAPPY] Pénalité pour les civilisations sans [LINK=literal]%s1_CivicName[\LINK]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET][ICON_UNHAPPY] Penalità per le civiltà senza la forma di governo [LINK=literal]%s1_CivicName[\LINK]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Penalización de [ICON_UNHAPPY] a las civilizaciones sin [LINK=literal]%s1_CivicName[\LINK]

TEXT.French: [SPACE]des routes commerciales ([ICON_TRADE])
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]por rutas comerciales ([ICON_TRADE])

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Emergence d'un Général illustre %D1_Mod%%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la aparición de Gran general

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la tasa de natalidad de [ICON_GREATPEOPLE]

TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%%[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Geburtenrate in Städten mit der Religion %F2_Religion
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%%[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Tasso di natalità nelle città con la religione %F2_Religion
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la tasa de natalidad de [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] en ciudades que sigan el %F2_Religion

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Taux de natalité %D1_Mod%%[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] dans les villes ayant comme religion d'état : F2_Religion
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%%[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Geburtenrate in Städten mit der Staatsreligion %F2_Religion
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%%[ICON_GREATPEOPLE] Tasso di natalità nelle città con la religione ufficiale %F2_Religion
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la tasa de natalidad de [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] en ciudades que tengan el %F2_Religion como religión oficial

TEXT.English: Extra commerce from workshops and watermills; extra unhappiness from banks; double production speed for forges, markets and grocers
Military units in cities increase happiness
TEXT.French: Les unités militaires stationnées dans les villes augmentent le bonheur.
TEXT.German: Militäreinheiten in Städten steigern die Zufriedenheit.
TEXT.Italian: Le unità militari nelle città aumentano la felicità
TEXT.Spanish: Las unidades militares aumentan la felicidad de las ciudades.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Extra stability for controlling foreign cores[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Reduced likeliness of respawns on your territory
Extra stability from controlling foreign cores; reduced likeliness of respawns on your territory

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% de croissance pour[SPACE]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% al crecimiento por[SPACE]

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_Icon por[SPACE]

TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]en todas las ciudades

TEXT.French: [SPACE]dans la capitale
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]en la capital

TEXT.English: May hire double the amount of engineers; increased production in all cities; extra production from workshops and watermills

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn dans les %d3_NumCities plus grandes villes
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HappyOrUn en las %d3_NumCities mayores ciudades

TEXT.English: Lower unit support costs; military units produced with food; double production speed for castles
[ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad per Military Unit Stationed in a City up to a Maximum of %D3
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad pro in einer Stadt stationierter Militäreinheit bis zu einem Maximum von %D3

TEXT.English: No additional income from foreign trade routes; +50% income from trade routes to and from capital; extra commerce from plantations and slave plantations; double production speed for customs houses; reduced expansion penalty for overseas colonies
Double production speed for walls; can spend gold to finish production of units; hurried units start with the mercenary promotion

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Unités militaires produites avec : [ICON_FOOD]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las unidades militares se producen con [ICON_FOOD]

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% de production d'unités militaires
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a la producción de unidades militares

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_Icon Coût de ravitaillement par unité militaire
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_Icon Costo di supporto per le unità militari
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_Icon de coste de abastecimiento por cada unidad militar

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Coûts d'entretien des unités militaires plus faible
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Costi di supporto delle unità militari ridotti
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Menores costes de abastecimiento de las unidades militares

TEXT.English: Increased war weariness; free specialist in all cities; +25% income from trade routes with defensive pact partners; increased upkeep for military units
Can draft three units per turn; barracks produce extra happiness
TEXT.French: Permet de mobiliser 3 unités par tour, la caserne accroît le bonheur.
TEXT.German: Ermöglicht die Rekrutierung von drei Einheiten/Runde. Erhöht den Kulturausstoß aller Städte.
TEXT.Italian: Può reclutare tre unità per turno; le caserme producono felicità extra
TEXT.Spanish: Se pueden reclutar tres unidades por turno, los cuarteles generan felicidad adicional.

TEXT.English: Extra experience for naval units; increased production speed for naval units; extra production from fishing boats and high sea fishing boats; double production speed for drydocks

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de [ICON_UNHEALTHY] en raison des bâtiments
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No hay [ICON_UNHEALTHY] por edificios

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les sociétés commerciales n'ont aucun effet
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las corporaciones no tienen efecto

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les sociétés commerciales étrangères n'ont aucun effet
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las corporaciones extranjeras no tienen efecto

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Aucune route commerciale étrangère
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Sin rutas comerciales extranjeras ([ICON_TRADE])

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No Additional Income from Foreign Trade Routes

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de coût d'entretien des Sociétés commerciales
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Sin costes de mantenimiento de las corporaciones

TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a los costes de mantenimiento de las corporaciones

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No Maintenance Costs from Number of Cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Aucun coût d'entretien dû au nombre de villes
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessun costo di mantenimento per il numero di città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Sin costes de mantenimiento por cantidad de ciudades

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% Maintenance Costs from Number of Cities
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Coût d'entretien %D1_Mod%% dû au nombre de villes
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% costo di mantenimento per il numero di città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Mod%% a los costes de mantenimiento por cantidad de ciudades

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Aucune [ICON_RELIGION] propagée
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No se propaga ninguna [ICON_RELIGION] que no sea la oficial

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de [ICON_UNHEALTHY] en raison de la population de la ville
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No hay [ICON_UNHEALTHY] por población de la ciudad

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Aucune [ICON_RELIGION] d'état
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Sin [ICON_RELIGION] oficial

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de [ICON_UNHAPPY] dû à la guerre
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Sin [ICON_UNHAPPY] bélico

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn par [ICON_RELIGION] dans une ville
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HappyOrUn por cada [ICON_RELIGION] en cada ciudad

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn par [ICON_RELIGION] non officielle dans une ville
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn je nichtstaatlicher Religion [ICON_RELIGION] in einer Stadt
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change di %F2_HappyOrUn per [ICON_RELIGION] non ufficiale di una città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HappyOrUn por cada [ICON_RELIGION] no oficial en cada ciudad
Ocupación

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No negative Stability Points from cities under occupation
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour les villes occupées
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di città occupate.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]No hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por las ciudades sometidas a ocupación

TEXT.English: Adds a Stability Points bonus on city conquest; no negative Stability Points from cities under occupation
TEXT.French: Ajoute un bonus de points de stabilité par ville conquise ; pas de points de stabilité négatifs pour les villes occupées
TEXT.German: Stabilitätspunktbonus bei Stadteroberung; keine Stabilitätspunktabzüge durch besetzte Städte
TEXT.Italian: Aggiunge un bonus di punti stabilità per la conquista di città; nessun punto stabilità negativo in caso di città occupate.
TEXT.Spanish: Añade una bonificación de puntos de estabilidad por conquista de ciudades; no hay puntos de estabilidad negativos por las ciudades sometidas a ocupación

TEXT.English: Extra unhappiness from non-state religions; cities with state religion construct buildings faster
Increases great people birth rate in cities with state religion; increases support costs for military units
TEXT.French: Augmente le taux de natalité des personnages illustres dans les villes ayant une religion d'état ainsi que le coût de ravitaillement des unités militaires.
TEXT.German: Zusätzliche Große Persönlichkeiten in Städten mit Staatsreligion. Höhere Unterhaltskosten für Militäreinheiten.
TEXT.Italian: Aumenta il ritmo di nascita dei Grandi Personaggi nelle città dotate di religione di stato; aumenta i costi di supporto per le unità militari
TEXT.Spanish: Aumenta la tasa de natalidad de grandes personajes en las ciudades con la religión oficial. Aumenta el coste de abastecimiento de las unidades militares.

TEXT.French: La forme la plus primitive de doctrine religieuse.
TEXT.Italian: La forma di Religione più primitiva
TEXT.Spanish: El principio religioso más primitivo.

TEXT.English: No state religion; extra unhappiness from non-state religions; extra happiness from pagan temples; can build classical wonders

[BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Make sure there are 15 [LINK=BUILDING_OBELI]Pagan Temples[\LINK] in the world[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Control ten wonders that require no state religion[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Don't allow more than half of your cities to have a religion

TEXT.French: [SPACE]par spécialiste
TEXT.Spanish: [SPACE]por cada especialista

TEXT.English: [SPACE]per Specialist for every city that works at most %d1 land tiles
TEXT.German: [SPACE]pro Spezialist für jede Stadt, die höchstens %d1 Landfelder bearbeitet

TEXT.English: Faster military unit production; less war anger; increased espionage output
TEXT.French: Accélère la production des unités militaires. Réduit le mécontentement dû à la guerre. Augmente la production de l'espionnage.
TEXT.German: Beschleunigte Produktion von Militäreinheiten, geringere Kriegsmüdigkeit, bessere Spionageleistungen
TEXT.Italian: Produzione delle unità militari più veloce; ridotta stanchezza della guerra; maggiore resa dello spionaggio.
TEXT.Spanish: Producción más rápida de unidades militares, menor hastío bélico, mayor rendimiento del espionaje

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]No more than one corporation per city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Post-communist crisis in case of economic system switch
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Maximal eine Kapitalgesellschaft pro Stadt[ICON_BULLET][ICON_BULLET]Post-kommunistische Krise im Falle eines Wirtschaftssystemwechsels

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can convert production to commerce with %D1_Mod%% efficiency
Decreased unhappiness from corporations, extra research from specialists, double production speed for hospitals and universities

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Vitesse de construction des bâtiments pour les villes ayant la religion %F1_RelIcon : %D2_Mod%%
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Städte mit der Religion %F1_RelIcon errichten Gebäude %D2_Mod%% schneller
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Le città con %F1_RelIcon costruiscono il %D2_Mod%% più velocemente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las ciudades con %F1_RelIcon construyen edificios un %D2_Mod%% más rápido

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_XP EXP dans les villes ayant pour religion : %F2_RelIcon
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_XP Erfahrungspunkte in Städten mit der Religion %F2_RelIcon
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_XP punti esperienza esperienza nelle città con %F2_RelIcon
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_XP puntos de experiencia en las ciudades con %F2_RelIcon

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les villes dont la religion est la suivante entraînent les unités %D2_Mod%% plus vite : %F1_RelIcon
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Städte mit der Religion %F1_RelIcon bilden Einheiten %D2_Mod%% schneller aus
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Le città con %F1_RelIcon addestrano le unità il %D2_Mod%% più rapidamente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las ciudades con %F1_RelIcon entrenan unidades un %D2_Mod%% más rápido

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn dans les villes ayant comme religion d'état [ICON_RELIGION]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change di %F2_HappyOrUn nelle città con la religione di stato [ICON_RELIGION]
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HappyOrUn en las ciudades con [ICON_RELIGION] oficial

TEXT.English: May hire double the amount of statesmen; increased happiness in six largest cities; extra happiness from courthouses
Increases great people birth rate; cottages, hamlets and villages develop faster

TEXT.French: [COLOR_RED]Req. [LINK=literal]%s1_TechName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Spanish: [COLOR_RED]Requiere [NUM1:el:la:los:las] [LINK=literal]%s1_TechName[\LINK][COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.French: Repeuplement
TEXT.Spanish: Reasentamiento

TEXT.English: Adds a Stability Points bonus for each city founded at least 15 tiles from the capital
TEXT.French: Ajoute un bonus de points de stabilité par ville fondée à 15 cases ou plus de la capitale
TEXT.German: Stabilitätspunktbonus für jede Stadt, die mindestens 15 Geländefelder von der Hauptstadt entfernt gegründet wurde
TEXT.Italian: Aggiunge un bonus di punti stabilità per ogni città fondata ad almeno 15 caselle dalla capitale.
TEXT.Spanish: Añade una bonificación de puntos de estabilidad por cada ciudad fundada al menos a 15 casillas de la capital

TEXT.English: Can build missionaries without monasteries; increases great people birth rate in cities with state religion; extra unhappiness from non-state religions

TEXT.French: Entretien : %d1[ICON_GOLD] par tour
TEXT.Spanish: Mantenimiento: %d1 [ICON_GOLD] por turno

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Build All Wonders that Require a State Religion
No state religion; increases science in all cities; can build wonders that require a state religion

[BOLD]Religious Victory:[\BOLD][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Tolerance: Control the [LINK=CONCEPT_TEMPLES_REDIRECT]Temples[\LINK] of seven different religions[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Humanism: Make sure there are 20 [LINK=BUILDING_UNIVERSITY]Universities[\LINK] controlled by Secular civilizations[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Modernization: Be the first to enter the Industrial and Modern eras

TEXT.French: Les ouvriers construisent les aménagements plus rapidement.
TEXT.Italian: I lavoratori costruiscono i miglioramenti più velocemente
TEXT.Spanish: Los trabajadores construyen mejoras más rápido.

TEXT.English: Can sacrifice city population to finish production
TEXT.French: Permet de sacrifier la population de la ville pour achever la production en cours.
TEXT.German: Opfert Bevölkerung, um die Produktion zu beschleunigen.
TEXT.Italian: Possibilità di sacrificare la popolazione cittadina per completare la produzione
TEXT.Spanish: Se puede sacrificar población de la ciudad para terminar la producción.

TEXT.English: Extra experience for land units; extra production from forts; double production speed for barracks' and stables
Extra production from specialists, extra food from workshops and watermills, double production speed for factories and coal plants

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Vitesse de construction des bâtiments pour les villes ayant une [ICON_RELIGION] d'état : %D1_Mod%%
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Städte mit der Staatsreligion [ICON_RELIGION] errichten Gebäude %D1_Mod%% schneller
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Le città con la [ICON_RELIGION] ufficiale costruiscono gli edifici il %D1_Mod%% più velocemente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las ciudades con [ICON_RELIGION] oficial construyen edificios un %D1_Mod%% más rápido

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_XP Experience Points in Cities with State [ICON_RELIGION]
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_XP EXP dans les villes ayant une [ICON_RELIGION] d'état
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_XP Erfahrungspunkte in Städten mit der Staatsreligion [ICON_RELIGION]
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_XP [NUM1:punto esperienza:punti esperienza] nelle città con [ICON_RELIGION] ufficiale
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_XP [NUM1:punto de experiencia:puntos de experiencia] en las ciudades con [ICON_RELIGION] oficial

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Les villes ayant une [ICON_RELIGION] d'état entraînent les unités %D1_Mod%% plus vite
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Städte mit der Staatsreligion [ICON_RELIGION] bilden Einheiten %D1_Mod%% schneller aus
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Le città con la [ICON_RELIGION] ufficiale addestrano le unità il %D1_Mod%% più rapidamente
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Las ciudades con [ICON_RELIGION] oficial entrenan unidades un %D1_Mod%% más rápido

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_HappyOrUn dans les villes ayant pour religion %F3_RelIcon
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_HappyOrUn en las ciudades con %F3_RelIcon

TEXT.French: Assujettissement
TEXT.Spanish: Subyugación

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change%F2_Icon Coût d'entretien par unité
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change %F2_Icon de coste de abastecimiento por cada unidad

TEXT.English: No maintenance penalty for distance to Palace
May hire double the amount of priests; extra happiness from state religion; extra unhappiness from non-state religions; cities with state religion give extra experience
[ICON_BULLET]No stability penalty for conquered cities or minority culture

No maintenance cost from distance to palace; military units in cities increase happiness to a limit of +4; extra espionage from specialists; no stability penalty for conquered cities or from minority cultures

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change routes commerciales par ville
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_Change rutas comerciales ([ICON_TRADE]) por ciudad

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad per Military Unit Stationed in a City
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad par unité militaire en garnison dans une ville
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad pro in einer Stadt stationierter Militäreinheit
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit%F2_HappyOrSad per le unità militari stazionate in città
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]%D1_PerUnit %F2_HappyOrSad por cada unidad militar destacada en la ciudad

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Coûts d'entretien des unités plus faible
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Menores costes de abastecimiento de las unidades

TEXT.English: Extra happiness in largest cities; extra production from towns
Workers build improvements faster; more production from workshops

TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+4 points de stabilité par vassal
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]+4 puntos de estabilidad por cada vasallo

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]+4 Stability Points for each civilization starting point controlled
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]+4 points de stabilité par point de départ de civilisation contrôlé
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]+4 punti stabilità per ogni punto di avvio di civiltà controllato.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]+4 puntos de estabilidad por cada punto de inicio de civilización controlado

TEXT.English: Extra experience for all units; extra commerce from forts; extra happiness from castles; extra stability from vassals

TEXT.French: Vice-royauté
TEXT.Spanish: Virreinato

TEXT.English: Adds a Stability Points bonus for each vassal
TEXT.French: Ajoute un bonus de points de stabilité par vassal
TEXT.Italian: Aggiunge un punto stabilità per ogni vassallo.
TEXT.Spanish: Añade una bonificación de puntos de estabilidad por cada vasallo

TEXT.English: Adds a Stability Points bonus for each civilization starting point controlled
TEXT.French: Ajoute un bonus de points de stabilité par point de départ de civilisation contrôlé
TEXT.Italian: Aggiunge un punto stabilità per ogni punto di avvio di civiltà controllato.
TEXT.Spanish: Añade una bonificación de puntos de estabilidad por cada punto de inicio de civilización controlado

TEXT.English: Decreased war unhappiness, double production speed of Barracks' and stables, no stability penalty for conquered cities

TEXT.Spanish: "Adoramos al déspota"

TEXT.Spanish: "Adoramos al dictador"

TEXT.Spanish: "Adoramos al monarca"

TEXT.Spanish: "Adoramos al presidente"

TEXT.Spanish: "Adoramos al primer ministro"

TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]I lavoratori costruiscono i miglioramenti il %D1_Mod%% più rapidamente

TEXT.Spanish: Sin mantenimiento
